attributes.action: make smoking 40 cigarettes a day compulsory for the over 40's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This policy would increase taxation so cutting the deficit, solve the problem of the aging society, reduce the state pension black hole, and enable private pension companies to increase their pensions due to the shortening of life expectancy, while protecting jobs in the tobacco industry.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
